channel.title: International: Top News And Analysis
channel.description: CNBC International is the world leader for news on business, technology, China, trade, oil prices, the Middle East and markets.

item.title: Trump victory deals latest severe blow to a struggling Germany
item.description: Donald Trump's election as U.S. President could be yet another major blow for the struggling German economy.

item.title: China urges U.S. cooperation as Trump trade threat looms
item.description: China emphasized the need for greater cooperation with the U.S. a day after it became clear President-elect Donald Trump would be the next U.S. president.

item.title: Adyen shares slide 10% as payments giant's transaction volume growth slows
item.description: Adyen, whose technology allows firms to accept payments online and in-store, reported third-quarter net revenue of 498.3 million euros, up 21% year-over-year.

item.title: Trump win and threat of more tariffs raises expectations for more China stimulus
item.description: Donald Trump's presidential win has raised the bar for Beijing's fiscal stimulus plans, expected Friday.

item.title: China October exports record highest jump in 19 months, imports decline more than expected
item.description: The world's second largest economy has been grappling with weakening domestic consumption and a protracted property crisis, with exports being a rare bright spot.

item.title: From coffee beans to milk, this Singapore-based startup uses AI to determine ingredient quality
item.description: ProfilePrint's AI platform could have implications for improving food security.

item.title: Nintendo jumps 6% as it says current Switch games will be playable on the console's successor
item.description: Nintendo will allow current Switch games to be played on the hit console's successor, as it looks to drum up excitement among its current user base.

item.title: Trump likely to uphold CHIPS Act despite his campaign rhetoric, experts say
item.description: President elect Donald Trump is unlikely to roll back the Biden administration’s CHIPS and Science Act, despite his campaign rhetoric on the bill, experts say.

item.title: The Fed is expected to cut interest rates again Thursday. Here's everything you need to know
item.description: Markets are pricing in a near-certainty that the FOMC will lower its benchmark rate by a quarter percentage point.

item.title: CNBC Daily Open: The Trump rally kicks off
item.description: Donald Trump’s victory in the U.S. presidential elections is providing a tailwind to risk assets. But Wednesday's frenzy could have been a relief rally too.

item.title: China extends visa-free policy to 9 more countries — including South Korea
item.description: This is the latest round of countries to be added to China's ever-growing visa-free policy, designed to spur inbound tourism which has yet to rebound.

item.title: Trump's victory spells doom for his criminal cases — but he's not off the hook for $570 million in civil fines
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump's election victory means he will likely be able to delay, or end, all the criminal proceedings that have been lodged against him.

item.title: ‘A huge victory’: World leaders react as Trump secures White House return
item.description: A flurry of world leaders sent their congratulations to President-elect Donald Trump after the 78-year-old triumphantly declared a "magnificent" victory.

item.title: What Trump's election to the White House could mean for EVs
item.description: Republicans, led by Trump, have largely condemned EVs, claiming they are being forced upon consumers and that they will ruin the U.S. auto industry.

item.title: Bitcoin surges 10% to a record above $76,000 as Trump victory heralds wider crypto adoption and weaker regulation
item.description: Crypto assets rose as investors bet that a second Trump administration will widen fiscal deficits and boost bitcoin as a hedge against higher inflation.

item.title: Brits brace for higher mortgage payments despite Bank of England seen cutting rates
item.description: Britons are facing the prospect of higher mortgages for longer even as the Bank of England readies to cut rates on Thursday.

item.title: More Iran sanctions and 'drill baby, drill': Oil market's future is still uncertain under Trump
item.description: The picture for the oil market's longer-term outlook under a new Trump presidency is, well, decidedly mixed.

item.title: Foreign automaker stocks slide on Trump tariff fears
item.description: Stock prices of foreign automakers fell sharply Wednesday amid concerns the U.S. will hike tariffs on imported vehicles under President-elect Donald Trump.

item.title: Europe praises Trump's victory amid wider fears of an impending economic nightmare
item.description: European leaders are congratulating Donald Trump for his victory, while sources add the outcome is not as shocking as when he clinched victory in 2016.

item.title: Jeff Bezos, Sam Altman, Tim Cook and other tech leaders congratulate Trump on election win
item.description: Leaders including Jeff Bezos, Sam Altman and Tim Cook congratulated the president-elect and said they looked forward to working with his administration.

item.title: Russia's top brass look for U.S. reset as Putin keeps quiet — for now
item.description: The Kremlin said President Vladimir Putin has no immediate plans to congratulate Donald Trump after he claimed victory in the U.S. presidential election.

item.title: Super Micro shares plummet 18% after financial update heightens investor concerns
item.description: Super Micro's stock fell to its lowest since mid-2023 on Wednesday after the company issued unaudited quarterly results that added to investor concerns.

item.title: Global ETFs slide as investors see Trump tariff policies hurting trade
item.description: Exchange-traded funds tracking international stocks broadly struggled as investors reacted to Donald Trump's victory.

item.title: Trump vow on new trade war sends shockwaves through supply chain, importers scramble to move up orders
item.description: President Trump's aggressive threats about new tariffs on imports are resulting in a scramble among shippers to get cargo into the U.S. sooner than planned.

item.title: Trump's election victory sparks dismay — and defiance — among architects of the Paris climate accord
item.description: Donald Trump's election victory on Wednesday sparked a palpable sense of dismay among the climate community.

item.title: UniCredit and Commerzbank square off with target hikes amid takeover battle
item.description: UniCredit and Commerzbank flaunted their financial strength as the fate of one of Europe's largest banking mergers still hangs in balance.

item.title: Trump Media shares surge as Trump wins presidential election
item.description: Shares of former President Donald Trump's media company jumped as he won the contentious presidential election.

item.title: Ukraine congratulates Trump — but a Republican win will scare Kyiv
item.description: Ukraine congratulated Donald Trump ahead of him winning the U.S. election Wednesday morning.

item.title: Tesla jumps nearly 15% as Trump-backer Musk seen benefiting from White House win
item.description: Shares of Tesla surged on Wednesday after NBC News projected Donald Trump to win the election and investors bet a victory would benefit CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares jump 8% after Wegovy sales beat expectations
item.description: Novo Nordisk on Wednesday reported third quarter earnings broadly in line with expectations and narrowed its 2024 full-year growth guidance.
